channel.title: RefactorFirst

item.title: Externalizing Application Configuration With Spring Cloud Config
item.description: In this article, we would be looking at how we can externalize application configuration using Spring Cloud Config.
item.author: contact@refactorfirst.com (Amrut Prabhu)
